name: Sage Amethyst Necklace and Bracelet Set
description:
Gorgeous set, Lovely Lilacy Amethyst chips and deep Amethyst 'Coffin' shaped beads.

Amethyst is a gentle stone, and can help treat Headaches, sleeplessness, Anxiety and Deppression.

Even if you dont believe in the power a gemstone can have, you have to admit, a good peice of gemstone jewellery always has the power to make you feel better about yourself!

All Gemstones are genuine, All items have Sterling silver fittings.
